document_data.caption: Amidst an apparent manticore attack, Allamon Sorn exits stage left.
document_data.name: Allamon Sorn
document_data.History: He was an acquaintance of [[Pasha]] [[Abon Duum]] and sat with him in the stands at the [[Arena of Blood]] in [[Manshaka]], [[Calimshan]], in the [[1357 DR|Year of the Prince, 1357 DR]]. Sorn remarked that the recaptured famous gladiator [[Vajra Valmeyjar]] might perish in her first match against a [[troll]], but Duum, her captor, spoke in her favor. Sorn fled as the [[illusion]] of a [[manticore]] appeared to assault Duum.
document_data.Description: Allamon was thin, with a pointed black goatee and dark skin, and wore blue robes and [[turban]].
